title: Can Artificial Intelligence Do Us In?
teaser: Experts say we should start preparing now to keep A.I. in check, even if we are many years away from creating technology that can match or surpass human intelligence.
contentencoded:
Engineers are likely decades away from creating an artificial intelligence that can match human intelligence, much less surpass it.

But experts say we should start preparing now to keep A.I. in check.

From our tech partner IEEE Spectrum, Eliza Strickland explains the risk.

Reporter

  • Eliza Strickland, associate editor for IEEE Spectrum. She tweets @newsbeagle.
